RECOVER_ACCOUNT_SEED_PHRASE.success:
Recover using passphrase is complete.
${numberOfAccounts} account(s) have been successfully recovered.
The last one is set as active.
RECOVER_ACCOUNT_SEED_PHRASE.error: Failed to recover account. No accounts were found for this passphrase.

SEND_MONEY.error: Sorry an error has occurred. You may want to try again.

CHECK_NEW_ACCOUNT.error: Account ID is taken. Try something else.

ADD_ACCESS_KEY.success: ${title} is now authorized to use your account.
ADD_ACCESS_KEY.error: An error occurred while approving this action. Please try again!

ADD_ACCESS_KEY_SEED_PHRASE.error: An error occurred while setting up passphrase recovery. Please try again!

SETUP_RECOVERY_MESSAGE.error: An error occurred while setting up your recovery method. Please try again!

SAVE_AND_SELECT_LEDGER_ACCOUNTS.success:
You’ve successfully signed in.
${numberOfAccounts} account(s) were recovered. Your most recently created account has been set to active.
SAVE_AND_SELECT_LEDGER_ACCOUNTS.error: Please check that your device is connected and the NEAR app is open.

REMOVE_ACCESS_KEY.error: Please check that your device is connected and the NEAR app is open.

ADD_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_ID.error:
Access to one of the accounts was rejected. No accounts were recovered.
To continue, you must authorize read-only access to each account on your Ledger device. Please try again.

GET_LEDGER_ACCOUNT_IDS.error:
Public key access was rejected. No accounts were recovered.
To continue, you must allow NEAR Wallet to view your public key. Please try again.

VERIFY_TWO_FACTOR.error: Two Factor Authentication setup failed. Please try again.

CHECK_IS_NEW.error: Account ID is taken. Try something else.

CREATE_NEW_ACCOUNT.error: Account ID is taken. Try something else.

TRANSFER_ALL_FROM_LOCKUP.success: You successfully transferred tokens from your lockup!
TRANSFER_ALL_FROM_LOCKUP.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

reduxActions.RetriesExceeded: Exceeded maximum attempts for this transaction.
reduxActions.U2F_4: Failed to sign with Ledger device: U2F DEVICE_INELIGIBLE. Please make sure that your Ledger device is connected and unlocked.

default.error: Sorry an error has occurred. You may want to try again.

addAccessKeySeedPhrase.errorSecond:
An error has occurred.
The passphrases was not added to your account. Please try again.

getLedgerAccountIds.U2FNotSupported: U2F browser support is needed for Ledger. Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with U2F extension.
getLedgerAccountIds.noAccounts: No accounts were found for this Ledger device. Please confirm you have associated an account with this Ledger.

staking.noWithdraw: Unable to withdraw pending balance from validator

addLedgerAccountId.errorRpc: Error appears while recovering the account.

setupRecoveryMessage.error: An error occurred while setting up your recovery method. Please try again!

addAccessKey.error:
An error has occurred.
To access your account, please enter the passphrase from the previous step below.

recoveryMethods.setupMethod: An error occured. Please check your recovery method.
recoveryMethods.lastMethod: Cannot delete your last recovery method. Unless you have Ledger enabled, you need to keep at least one recovery method active to ensure recoverability of your account.

recoverAccountSeedPhrase.errorInvalidSeedPhrase: No accounts were found for this passphrase.

lockup.transferAllWithStakingPoolBalance: Unstake and withdraw all funds from the staking pool in order to transfer your remaining lockup balance to Wallet.

requestCode.error: Failed to send SMS with code.

recoverAccount.success:
Recover using passphrase is complete.
${numberOfAccounts} account(s) have been successfully recovered.
The last one is set as active.

create.errorInvalidAccountIdLength: Account ID must be between 2 and 64 characters
create.errorAccountNotExist: There was a problem creating your account. Please try again!

available.implicitAccount: Always double check the account ID
available.implicitAccountModal: Please double check the account ID, especially if this is an exchange account. If the account ID is entered incorrectly, your funds will be lost forever.

pre.title: Almost there! Make your initial deposit.
pre.desc: To begin using NEAR Wallet, make a minimum initial deposit by sending at least ${amount} NEAR to your Account ID (sometimes called an “address”).

post.title: Your account has been activated.
post.descOne: Your initial deposit has been received and transferred to your new account. Your account is now active!
post.descTwo: A portion of your deposit has been reserved to cover the cost of hosting your account.

pre.title: Almost there! Activate your account with an initial deposit.
pre.descOne: To begin using NEAR Wallet, meet the minimum initial deposit by sending at least ${amount} NEAR to your single-use funding address below.
pre.descTwo: Return to this screen once your funds have been deposited to finish creating your account.

whereToBuy.title: Purchase NEAR tokens
whereToBuy.desc: NEAR tokens are available to purchase through the following exchanges

moonPay.title: Fund with MoonPay
moonPay.desc: Make your initial deposit with MoonPay using your preferred payment method.

post.title: Claim your account
post.descOne: Your initial deposit was received! Once claimed, your deposit will be transferred to your new account.
post.descTwo: Important: Your single-use funding address will no longer be valid. Make sure to replace it with your Account ID on any exchanges or other devices where it may have been saved.

modal.title: Update your address
modal.descOne: By continuing, you acknowledge that the single-use funding address will be replaced, and any additional funds sent to the old address will be lost.
modal.descTwo: Remember to replace it with your Account ID on any exchanges or other devices where it may have been saved.

success.title: Welcome to NEAR
success.descOne: Congratulations ${accountId}! Your account has been successfully created.
success.descTwo: You must now use this Account ID as your address for all NEAR operations.
success.descThree: Please update your address on any exchanges or other devices.

sendNewRecoveryLink.error: Failed to resend. Please try again.

details.warning: This allows access to your entire balance. Please proceed with caution.

incorrectContractId.error: The contract ${contractId} does not exist. This may be an issue with the application you are trying to use, or this contract may have been deleted. You will be redirected back to the application

sendMoney.error: Sorry an error has occurred. You may want to try again.

setupSeedPhrase.pageText: Write down the following words IN ORDER and keep them somewhere safe. You cannot recover your account without them!

setupSeedPhraseVerify.pageText: Enter the following word from your recovery phrase to complete the setup process.

setupSeedPhraseSuccess.pageText: Use your Recovery Phrase to restore your account.
setupSeedPhraseSuccess.pageTextSecondLine: Anyone with access to your Recovery Phrase can access your funds, so keep it offline somewhere safe and secure.

selectAccountDropdown.switchAccounthNotAllowed: This app doesn't allow account changes

recoverWithLink.title: Restore Account
recoverWithLink.pTwo: If this isn't your preferred browser, copy the URL and complete this process in your browser of choice.
recoverWithLink.errorP: Please check your email or phone for the most recent message. Links in all earlier messages are invalid.

recoveryMgmt.title: Recovery Methods
recoveryMgmt.noRecoveryMethod: You have no method to recover your account. please add a method below.
recoveryMgmt.disableTitle: Are you sure you want to disable this method?
recoveryMgmt.disableTextLink: The magic link you received will be permanently deactivated.
recoveryMgmt.disableTextPhrase: Your current passphrase will be permanently deactivated.
recoveryMgmt.disableInputPlaceholder: Enter your account ID to confirm
recoveryMgmt.disableNotAllowed: Accounts are required to have at least one active recovery method. Please first enable an alternative recovery method to proceed.

hardwareDevices.title: Hardware Devices
hardwareDevices.desc: Improve the security of your account by using a hardware wallet.

ledger.title: Ledger Hardware Wallet
ledger.disclaimer: In order to disable your ledger device, you must first enable an alternative recovery method.
ledger.connect: Your ledger is not currently connected. We advise that you re-connect your Ledger to ensure your account is secured.

disable.title: Are you sure you want to disable Ledger?
disable.desc: Make sure you have other recovery methods setup before disabling.

twoFactor.subHeader: Two factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. With 2FA enabled, all transactions must be confirmed using SMS or email.
twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.desc: Protect your account by requiring confirmation via SMS or email when authorizing transactions.
twoFactor.notEnoughBalance: To enable 2FA, your account requires a minimum available balance of
twoFactor.promptDesc: We highly recommend that you set up a two-factor authentication method to increase the security of your account and assests

verify.title: Enter Two-Factor Verification Code
verify.desc: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to:

disable.title: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?
disable.desc: Keep in mind that transactions won't have to be confirmed with 2FA once it's disabled.

alertBanner.title: When enabled, ${data} NEAR will be locked to cover the contract storage costs of two-factor authentication.

twoFactor.checkBox: I acknowledge that by enabling two-factor authentication, ${amount} NEAR will be reserved to cover contract storage.

fullAccessKeys.submitAnyTransaction: Submit any transaction on your behalf
fullAccessKeys.noKeys:
You have not connected your NEAR Wallet to any applications. When you do, you can manage them here.

See what's been built with NEAR:
fullAccessKeys.dashboardNoKeys: You have no full access keys

authorizedApps.dashboardNoApps: You have not authorized any apps

ledgerSignTxModal.SEND_MONEY: You will need to confirm transfer details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.ADD_ACCESS_KEY: You will need to confirm login details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.SET_SIGN_TRANSACTION_STATUS: You will need to confirm deposit details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.REMOVE_ACCESS_KEY: You will need to confirm delete key details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.ADD_ACCESS_KEY_SEED_PHRASE: You will need to confirm full access details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.DELETE_RECOVERY_METHOD: You will need to confirm delete key details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.SETUP_RECOVERY_MESSAGE: You will need to confirm full access details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.ADD_LEDGER_ACCESS_KEY: You will need to confirm public key details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.GET_LEDGER_PUBLIC_KEY: You will need to confirm public key access on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.CREATE_NEW_ACCOUNT: You will need to confirm add a key for new account on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.CREATE_ACCOUNT_FROM_IMPLICIT: You will need to confirm account creation on your Ledger. This includes transactions needed to move balance from temporary account.
ledgerSignTxModal.SIGN_AND_SEND_TRANSACTIONS: You will need to confirm deposit details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.REMOVE_NON_LEDGER_ACCESS_KEYS: You will need to confirm details on your Ledger.
ledgerSignTxModal.STAKE: You will need to confirm staking on your Ledger
ledgerSignTxModal.UNSTAKE: You will need to confirm unstaking on your Ledger
ledgerSignTxModal.WITHDRAW: You will need to confirm withdrawal on your Ledger
ledgerSignTxModal.DISABLE_LEDGER: You will need to confirm public key details on your Ledger.

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.subLabel: The account ID must include a Top Level Account such as .near or contain exactly 64 characters.

recoverAccount.pageText: If you’ve setup one or more account recovery methods, follow the instructions below to import your account.

email.title: Email
email.desc: Check your email for a message from near.org with the subject:
email.subject: "Important: Near Wallet Recovery Email".

phone.title: Phone
phone.desc: Check your phone records for an SMS message from

phrase.title: Passphrase
phrase.desc: Make sure you have your 12 word recovery phrase, then click below to begin the recovery process.

ledger.title: Ledger
ledger.desc: Make sure your ledger is connected securely, and that the NEAR app is open on the device.

recoverAccount.actionRequired: This message contains a magic link. Click the link to begin recovery!
recoverAccount.cannotResend: This message was sent when you enabled email/phone recovery. We only send this message once, and cannot resend it.

termsPage.title: Before you begin...
termsPage.descOne: NEAR accounts require a minimum balance of at least ${data} NEAR to hold a place on the network.
termsPage.descTwo: After reserving a unique account address, you’ll be asked to make a small initial deposit to activate your account.
termsPage.disclaimer: By creating a NEAR account, you agree to the NEAR Wallet Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

createAccount.pageText: Enter an Account ID to use with your NEAR account. Your Account ID will be used for all NEAR operations, including sending and receiving assets.

note.canContain: Your account ID can contain any of the following:
note.separators: Characters (_-) can be used as separators

invalidLinkDrop.title: Link Invalid
invalidLinkDrop.one: This NEAR Drop has been claimed.
invalidLinkDrop.two: NEAR Drops can only be used to create a single account, after which the link will expire.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.desc: By proceeding with creating a NEAR account, you agree to the NEAR Wallet Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. We urge you to read them carefully:
terms.termsCheck: I agree to the Terms of Service
terms.privacyCheck: I agree to the Privacy Policy

fail.title: Failed to load reCAPTCHA.
fail.desc: reCAPTCHA is required in order to authorize new accounts funded by NEAR.

reCAPTCHA.disclaimer: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.

linkdropLanding.title: You’ve received a NEAR drop!
linkdropLanding.desc: You may claim your NEAR drop with an existing account (must be logged in), or create a new account to receive it as an initial deposit.

modal.title: Your NEAR drop has been claimed
modal.desc: Your NEAR drop has been automatically deposited to your account.

topLevelAccounts.body: Account names are similar to domain names. Only the ${data} account can create accounts such as yourname.${data}, and only yourname.${data} can create app.yourname.${data}. All accounts created in this wallet use the .${data} Top Level Account (TLA). To learn more about account names and creating your own TLA, visit the docs.

recoverSeedPhrase.pageText: Enter the backup passphrase associated with the account.

setupRecovery.subHeader: Select a method to secure and recover your account. This will be used to verify important activity, recover your account and access your account from other devices.
setupRecovery.basicSecurityDesc: Enter your email address or phone number and receive a magic link
setupRecovery.emailDesc: Receive a verification code and account recovery link via email.
setupRecovery.phoneDesc: Receive a verification code and account recovery link via SMS.
setupRecovery.notSupportedPhone: Unfortunately, we do not offer SMS for your region. Please choose email instead.
setupRecovery.advancedSecurityDesc: Write down a 12 word passphrase, or secure your account with your Ledger device.
setupRecovery.ledgerDesc: Secure your account with a Ledger hardware device.
setupRecovery.phraseDesc: Generate and safely store a unique passphrase.

setRecoveryConfirm.title: Enter Verification Code
setRecoveryConfirm.pageText: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to the

one.email: If you did not yet receive this email, or the above email address is incorrect,
one.phoneNumber: If you did not yet receive this SMS, or the above phone number is incorrect,

two.email: to Re-enter your email address and resend.
two.phoneNumber: to Re-enter your phone number and resend.

disclaimer.title: DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.text: This is a developers' preview Wallet. It should be used for NEAR Protocol DevNet only. Learn more at

footer.desc: NEAR is a scalable computing and storage platform that changes how the web works for better.

buyNear.descTwo: NEAR is available to purchase through the following exchanges.

This provides access to all of your tokens.

confirm.pageTextSecondLine: To confirm, please enter your account ID below.

details.noDescription: No description specified for this method

cliLoginSuccess.pageText: Please close this window and follow the instructions in the terminal.

addNode.pageText: Setup your Node via CLI, then add it here.

ipAddressInput.title: Enter the IP Address of your Node

addNode.desc: Your node must be setup via CLI before adding it here.

nodeDetails.pageText: Update the details of your node.

steps.title: To run a node or stake, please fallow these steps:

one.title: 1. Setup & Run a Node via CLI

two.title: 2. Wait for Node to Sync
two.desc: An out of sync node cannot produce or validate

three.title: 3. Start Staking
three.desc: Stake from here or CLI. See docs for help.

noNode.title: Already have your node setup? Add it here.
noNode.text: This connects your node to your wallet account.

staking.pageText: Setup your Node via CLI, then add it here.

staking.title: Staking
staking.desc: Stake your NEAR tokens with a validator
staking.noValidators: You haven't staked with a validator yet.

staked.title: Total amount staked
staked.info: NEAR tokens currently staked with validators. These tokens are accumulating rewards. To access these tokens, you must first unstake and then withdraw them.

unclaimed.title: Rewards earned
unclaimed.info: Rewards that have been earned, but not withdrawn. Rewards earned are automatically restaked, which means your Total Amount Staked automatically increases over time, and your rewards are compounding.

unavailable.title: Unable to display rewards earned.
unavailable.modalTitle: Unable to display staking rewards earned
unavailable.modalDescOne: We are currently unable to calculate rewards when Two-Factor Authentication is enabled. We hope to enable this functionality in the near future.
unavailable.modalDescTwo: In the meantime, you will be able to see your rewards accumulating under ”Total amount staked”. This balance will grow while your tokens are staked, since your rewards are automatically re-staked with your current validator.

available.title: Available for withdrawal
available.info: These tokens have been unstaked, and are ready to be withdrawn.

pending.title: Pending release
pending.info: These tokens have been unstaked, but are not yet ready to withdraw. Tokens are ready to withdraw 52 to 65 hours after unstaking.

stake.title: Stake Amount
stake.desc: Enter the amount you would like to stake with your chosen validator.
stake.ledgerDisclaimer: Note: Since this is your first time staking with this validator, you will need to confirm two transactions.
stake.accounts: If you have locked NEAR, you can choose to stake with either your locked NEAR (lockup.near), or your unlocked NEAR (your account name). You will only see the staking positions for the selected account. If you do not have locked NEAR, you can ignore this section

banner.stakeMax: A small portion (${data} NEAR) of your available balance has been reserved to cover transaction fees.
banner.insufficientBalance: You are attempting to stake your entire available balance. At least ${data} NEAR must be reserved to cover transaction fees.

unstake.title: Unstake Tokens
unstake.desc: Enter the number of tokens you would like to unstake from your current validator.
unstake.beforeUnstakeDisclaimer: Unstaked tokens will be made available pending a release period of ~52-65hrs (4 epochs).

stakeSuccess.title: Success!
stakeSuccess.desc: Your stake has successfully been delegated to your chosen validator:
stakeSuccess.descTwo: You can now view your delegation and staking rewards from your staking dashboard.

unstakeSuccess.title: Success!
unstakeSuccess.desc: ${amount} NEAR has successfully been unstaked from this validator:
unstakeSuccess.descTwo: Your tokens are pending release and will be made available within ~52-65hrs (4 epochs).

desc.account: Enter a known validator or select a validator from the list to stake your NEAR tokens.
desc.lockup: Enter a known validator or select a validator from the list to stake your NEAR tokens. You may only stake with a single validator at any given time.
desc.unstake: Select the validator pool from which you wish to unstake your tokens.
desc.withdraw: Select the validator pool from which you wish to withdraw your tokens.

validator.title:
Validator:
${validator}
validator.desc: This is the fee paid to the validator to stake on your behalf. This fee is only charged on your rewards.
validator.withdrawalDisclaimer: Funds pending release will be made available after ~52-65hrs (4 epochs)

alertBanner.title: You must first unstake and withdraw your tokens from your current validator in order to stake with a new validator.

noValidators.title: You are not currently staking with any validators.

lockupBanner.title: You have ${amount} NEAR available to withdraw from your lockup!

security.title: Security & Recovery
security.mostSecureDesc: Ledger is the most secure option. Passphrases can be secure if used correctly (they must be written down and stored safely).
security.lessSecureDesc: These options are recommended for accounts with small amounts of NEAR and other assets. They are convenient, but do present additional risk to the more secure options. If your email account or SMS messages are compromised, your funds might be at risk.

profile.twoFactorDesc: Authenticate with SMS or email when authorizing transactions and/or signing in to your account.

lockPopup.title: Why is this locked?
lockPopup.text: Your account ID is your unique identifier in the system and cannot be changed because data and asset ownership is tied to it. However you are welcome to ${link} with desired name and transfer assets as needed.

details.qrDesc: Use your phone's camera app to send to this address

subtitle.default: Enter the amount of NEAR to send, and the account ID to send it to.

amountStatusId.notEnoughTokens: You must leave at least ${amount} NEAR in your account
amountStatusId.howMuch: How much do you want to send?

sendMoney.onceConfirmed: Once confirmed, this cannot be undone.

banner.useMax: A small portion (${data} NEAR) of your available balance has been reserved to cover transaction fees.
banner.insufficient: You are attempting to send your entire available balance. At least ${data} NEAR must be reserved to cover transaction fees.

ActionWarrning.functionCall: No description specified for this function.
ActionWarrning.deployContract: You are about to deploy a contract to your account! This contract can access your NEAR balance, and interact with other contracts on your behalf.
ActionWarrning.stake: You are about to stake NEAR tokens. These tokens will be locked, and are at risk of being lost if your validator becomes unresponsive.
ActionWarrning.deleteAccount: You are about to delete your account! Your NEAR balance will be destroyed, and all of your account data deleted.

sign.hereAreSomeDetails: Here are some details that will help you.

availableBalanceInfo: ”Available Balance” is your spendable NEAR balance.
reservedForFeesInfo: A minimum amount of NEAR is reserved to cover the cost of transactions.
availableBalanceProfile: This is your spendable NEAR balance, and can be used or transferred immediately. This will be lower than your Total Balance.
minimumBalance: This is the minimum NEAR balance your account must maintain to remain active. This balance represents the storage space your account is using on the NEAR blockchain (with a small buffer), and will go up or down as you use more or less space.
totalBalance: Your total balance represents all NEAR tokens under your control. In many cases, you will not have immediate access to this entire balance (e.g. if it is locked, delegated, or staked). Check your Available Balance for the NEAR you can actively use, transfer, delegate, and stake.
stakedBalance: This NEAR is actively being used to back a validator and secure the network. When you decide to unstake this NEAR, it will take some time to be shown in your Available Balance, as NEAR takes 4 epochs (~52-65 hours) to unstake.
unvestedBalance: Unvested NEAR is earmarked to you, but not yet under your ownership. You can still delegate or stake this NEAR, and the rewards will be entirely yours. As your NEAR is vested, it will appear in either your Locked or Unlocked balance.
lockedBalance: This NEAR is locked in a lockup contract, and cannot be withdrawn. You may still delegate or stake this NEAR. Once the NEAR is unlocked, you can view it in your Unlocked Balance, and chose to withdraw it (moving to your Available Balance).
unlockedBalance: This NEAR is still in a lockup contract, but unlocked.
unlockedAvailTransfer: This NEAR is unlocked, and can be transferred out of your lockup contract.
stakingPoolUnstaked: This NEAR is currently in a staking pool but unstaked. It could for example be in a pending release state.

setupLedger.one:
Connect your Ledger Nano S or X to your computer or mobile device via USB and open the NEAR application.

Then, press both buttons at the 'Pending Ledger Review' screen.
setupLedger.two: If you have not yet installed the NEAR Ledger app, follow

setupLedgerSteps.header: Install NEAR on your Ledger device
setupLedgerSteps.one: Open Ledger Live, install any firmware updates available.
setupLedgerSteps.two: Click on the Manager tab, then search for NEAR.
setupLedgerSteps.three: Follow the instructions to install the NEAR application on your device.

setupLedgerSuccess.one: We recommend that you remove all existing keys (recovery methods and devices).
setupLedgerSuccess.two: Maintaining multiple keys and recovery methods (including passphrases) increases the vulnerability of your account.
setupLedgerSuccess.primaryCta: Remove Existing Keys and Recovery Methods

one.remove: Before removing your existing keys and recovery methods, make sure that you have recorded and securely stored your Ledger passphrase.
one.keep: Maintaining multiple recovery methods and devices increases the vulnerability of your account.

two.remove: If you lose access to your passphrase, NEAR Inc. will be unable to assist you in recovery of your account and its funds.

signInLedger.header: Sign in with your Ledger device
signInLedger.one: Make sure your ledger is connected securely, and that the NEAR app is open on the device.

modal.ledgerMustAdd: Ledger must add an access key for each account protected by your device:

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.subTitle: HD Path
advanced.desc: Specify an HD path to import its linked accounts.

header.confirm: Please confirm the operation on your device...

confirmLedgerModal.one: You will need to confirm your sign-in details on your Ledger.

enterAccountNameLedgerModal.one: Enter the name of the account you’re signing in to

type.RetriesExceeded: Exceeded maximum attempts for this transaction.
type.LackBalanceForState: Your available balance is too low to perform any actions on your account. Please send NEAR to your account and then try again.

ledger.U2FNotSupported: U2F browser support is needed for Ledger. Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with a U2F extension. Also make sure you're on an HTTPS connection.
ledger.U2F_4: Failed to sign with Ledger device: U2F DEVICE_INELIGIBLE. Please make sure that your Ledger device is connected and unlocked.

networkBanner.title: Test-only Wallet
networkBanner.desc: This wallet (and network) are for testing purposes only. Tokens and other assets have no value. Accounts created do not transfer to Mainnet.

stagingBanner.title: Warning: This is a pre-release version of Wallet. Use at your own risk!
stagingBanner.desc: Warning: This is a pre-release version of the NEAR Wallet. There may be bugs, and these bugs may lead to loss of funds. By continuing to use this version, you agree that you understand and accept these risks, and understand that the NEAR Wallet team will be unable to help you.

landing.title: NEAR is here.
landing.desc: Securely store and stake your NEAR tokens and compatible assets with NEAR Wallet.
landing.banner: NEAR Wallet is in Private Beta

emailSubscribe.title: Sign up below for early access
